alert.note: Alert for Davis Mountains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 10 at 2:55AM CST until January 12 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 9 AM CST THURSDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THURSDAY TO 8 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. For the High Wind Warning, west winds 35 to 55 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Davis Mountains. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from noon today to 9 AM CST Thursday. For the High Wind Warning, from 9 AM Thursday to 8 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Severe turbulence near the mountains will be hazardous for low flying light aircraft.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. The high winds can topple trees, down power lines and damage some structures. Use caution if you must drive.
